choices: Travel the world as a good heroic completely fat giant.
Wreak havoc or eat an entire unsuspecting metropolis or two.
1.content:
Once upon a time somewhere in an alternate reality, yours truly happens to be a 31 year old great big completely fat male anthropomorphic cat that happens to be a lookalike of a young kitten that only appeared in 2 1950's era Warner Brothers animated shorts Kidding the Kitten and its sequel A Peck o' Trouble.

You see I live in an alternate reality whereas our alternate reality is like that of the real world itself, as both good heroic anthropomorphic animals which includes yours truly and bad villainous anthropomorphic animals reside here as I also forgot to mention that I happen to be a pro wrestler mainly a face wrestler that's currently employed with the Anthropomorphic Animal Wrestling League itself.

The Anthropomorphic Animal Wrestling League happens to be a professional wrestling organization that is quite similar to that of World Wrestling Entertainment itself as we anthropomorphic animals themselves travel the world itself competing in different divisions and matches as yours truly happens to be in the great big completely fat division itself as my ring name is Cat Kong, also in this division that I'm in we great big completely fat pro wrestlers don't have to wear anything at all except for our fur and or feathers.

One day after having beaten a heel wrestler in our division, I was just relaxing in a hot tub that was big enough for me and anyone who also wanted to use it as I at first felt sort of a tingling feeling then right after that I started growing bigger and fatter at an alarming rate as I outgrew everything around me as my shadow was now looming over everyone and everything.

"So this is what it feels like to be a completely fat giant, you know I could get used to being a completely fat giant and all that, but now that I'm a completely fat giant what will I do next?" I said to myself.
1.title: And so it begins.

info.description:
In an alternative reality where Anthropomorphic Animals in a modern life are affected by an event that cause them to grow BIGGER than life.
